function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in futureproofing requirements","Impact":"Inefficient or ineffective design of healthcare facilities, leading to suboptimal performance in terms of disease control and propagation","Mitigation":"Regular updates and revisions of design criteria, ongoing monitoring of public health trends, and flexible design approaches","Technologies":"Digital simulation and modeling tools for healthcare facility design","People":"Public clients, healthcare facility designers, construction contractors","Owner":"Healthcare facility designers, construction contractors"},{"Description":"Lack of experience in workshop attendees","Impact":"Poor decision-making in defining value criteria and evaluating design alternatives, leading to suboptimal futureproofing performance","Mitigation":"Ensure representation from key disciplines, provide training and educational resources for workshop attendees, and consult with experienced experts","Technologies":"Collaborative software for virtual workshops, educational resources for multidisciplinary training","People":"Workshop attendees, public clients, designers","Owner":"Public clients, designers"},{"Description":"Misalignment of design with public health trends","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation and inadequate response to future public health challenges in healthcare facility design","Mitigation":"Regular consultation with public health experts, analysis of public health data, and integration of flexible design features","Technologies":"Health data analytics tools, real-time public health monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare facility designers, public health experts","Owner":"Healthcare facility designers"}]}
